"What is this, this cannot be!": "Guh, gaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!"

"My strength is draining...?!
No, it's being devoured?"
"Hehe, Guardian... This is your doing, isn't it? Such a mysterious ability you have."
"But because of that... it's worth it to take it away!"
"Hah, heheh... To be struck down by experimental trash... But that is why it's been so entertaining...!"
"Hah... Hah..."
"Gettemhart!"
"Is this it? Is this how it ends?"
"Damned Emperor, is this how you wanted it...! Just to be taken down by the strongest, without leaving anything else...!"
"Let's leave, Gettemhart. Even if the Emperor is dead, our battle isn't over just yet."
"Yes, the battle isn't finished just yet... I'll leave a tear in this world."
"Watch out!"
"Move out of the way!"
"Gettemhart!"
"Sina! Are you ok? Huh!?"
"Yes... I am fine."
"This vessel moves better than I had expected."
"Wha-- Ugh--!"
"Although having to steal this inferior body was a minor setback... It's not bad at all. This vessel is quite adequate."
"Wait, no, Schlegger!?"
"You stole her body!?"
"Correct. Claiming a body by possessing another. This is the secret art of Demonization."
"Using Demonization, our Mana is forced inside a body, which from there it is then utilized. It's not a foreign concept."
"In a single vessel, two souls are useless. Therefore, the weaker soul is devoured and the stronger remains. No further explanation is necessary."
"Sina... is gone... Don't bullshit me..."
"Hehehe. You move well despite taking such a fatal blow. However, in your state, you won't last more than a few minutes."
"Hah--ck... Damn you--guhhh!"
"Oh, did you love and care about the person this body belonged to? Well, I could have let you have some fun with it, however save it for the afterlife."
"Don't...mess with...me! Sina's body... Isn't your--ckaaa!"
"You can't, you mustn't! Can't we just talk things over!?"
"Guardian, let's have a rematch without this trash. It shall be different than my previous broken body."
"What's wrong? Afraid to strike this body, this face? That's fine, you shall just die as you were. The victor is justice after all."
"What...! I can't control what this body is doing...!"
"Sina...?"
"Gettemhart... Guardian... I don't... want this..."
"Please...! You have to... kill me and the Emperor...!!"
"Hah! What! So, you were still in there after all! Alas, this will be the end of it!"
"What...! You're still moving, what are you?!"
"Even if I'm dying... I still have my pride... How can I die and not fulfill Sina's wish...?!"
"Gettemhart, wait!"
"This is annoying... I don't have enough strength to defeat the Emperor."
"However, it's possible to transfer this strength. My soul, this damned strength...!"
"It pisses me off... but this is better than nothing! I don't want to die doing nothing!"
"If that happened... Then I couldn't face Sina!"
"I've been consumed by [Elder] and now I'm being consumed by the Guardian. Hah, what a weird twist of fate this is..."
"I knew that we had the same aura when we first met on Naberius... However, I never imagined that I'd be absorbed by you."
"I won't be bothering to ask what's going on. It's all a whim of the Akashic Record after all. Just thinking about it is useless."
"Now go, use my power... This power, the power of [Elder]."
"And save them... Show me how you handle things."
"<%me>, you've gained Gettemhart's Photons..."
"No, this is... [Elder]'s energy patterns!"
"<%me>... What is this?"
"But this form... It's [Elder]'s!"
"Kehaha, ahahaha! So you've obtained a power similar to my own! You are indeed a worthy opponent!"
"Guardian, it seems that it will be a one on one fight between us!"
"I'm not alone."
"There's three here."
"Our thoughts... We entrust them to you."
"Use everything you've got and hit him hard!"
